desc: You can now make some of the most popular boba tea flavors the right way at home. These boba tea kits are sourced from Taiwan and formulated to taste like the ones you'd order at a boba stop. Each kit from our store contains everything you need to make amazing drinks: tea or flavor, boba, cream base, sugar & big straw.

layout.text: Unique boba tea merch can be found here! But also not just boba; we have ramen, pho, sushi or taco as well; any awesome thing that just make us feel excited really!
